verses.verse: Then the <S%H5029>prophets,<s%> <S%H2292>Haggai<s%> the <S%H5029>prophet,<s%> and <S%H2148>Zechariah<s%> the <S%H1247>son<s%> of <S%H5714>Iddo,<s%> <S%H5013>prophesied<s%> <S%H5922>unto<s%> the <S%H3062>Jews<s%> <S%H1768>that<s%> were in <S%H3061>Judah<s%> and <S%H3390>Jerusalem<s%> in the <S%H8036>name<s%> of the <S%H426>God<s%> of <S%H3479>Israel,<s%> even <S%H5922>unto<s%> them.

Then <S%H116><s%> rose <S%H6966>up<s%> <S%H2217>Zerubbabel<s%> the <S%H1247>son<s%> of <S%H7598>Shealtiel,<s%> and <S%H3443>Jeshua<s%> the <S%H1247>son<s%> of <S%H3136>Jozadak,<s%> and <S%H8271>began<s%> to <S%H1124>build<s%> the <S%H1005>house<s%> of <S%H426>God<s%> <S%H1768>which<s%> is at <S%H3390>Jerusalem:<s%> and <S%H5974>with<s%> them were the <S%H5029>prophets<s%> <S%H1768>of<s%> <S%H426>God<s%> <S%H5583>helping<s%> them.

At the same <S%H2166>time<s%> <S%H858>came<s%> <S%H5922>to<s%> them <S%H8674>Tatnai,<s%> <S%H6347>governor<s%> on this <S%H5675>side<s%> the <S%H5103>river,<s%> and <S%H8370>Shethar-boznai,<s%> and their <S%H3675>companions,<s%> and <S%H560>said<s%> <S%H3652>thus<s%> unto them, <S%H4479>Who<s%> hath <S%H7761>commanded<s%> <S%H2942><s%> you to <S%H1124>build<s%> <S%H1836>this<s%> <S%H1005>house,<s%> and to make <S%H3635>up<s%> <S%H1836>this<s%> <S%H846>wall?<s%>

Then <S%H116><s%> <S%H560>said<s%> we unto them after this <S%H3660>manner,<s%> <S%H4479>What<s%> are the <S%H8036>names<s%> of the <S%H1400>men<s%> <S%H1768>that<s%> <S%H1124>make<s%> <S%H1836>this<s%> <S%H1147>building?<s%>

But the <S%H5870>eye<s%> of their <S%H426>God<s%> <S%H1934>was<s%> <S%H5922>upon<s%> the <S%H7868>elders<s%> of the <S%H3062>Jews,<s%> that they could <S%H3809>not<s%> cause <S%H1994>them<s%> to <S%H989>cease,<s%> <S%H5705>till<s%> the <S%H2941>matter<s%> <S%H1946>came<s%> to <S%H1868>Darius:<s%> and <S%H116>then<s%> they returned <S%H8421>answer<s%> by <S%H5407>letter<s%> <S%H5922>concerning<s%> <S%H1836>this<s%> matter.

The <S%H6573>copy<s%> of the <S%H104>letter<s%> <S%H1768>that<s%> <S%H8674>Tatnai,<s%> <S%H6347>governor<s%> on this <S%H5675>side<s%> the <S%H5103>river,<s%> and <S%H8370>Shethar-boznai,<s%> and his <S%H3675>companions<s%> the <S%H671>Apharsachites,<s%> <S%H1768>which<s%> were on this <S%H5675>side<s%> the <S%H5103>river,<s%> <S%H7972>sent<s%> <S%H5922>unto<s%> <S%H1868>Darius<s%> the king: <S%H4430><s%>

They <S%H7972>sent<s%> a <S%H6600>letter<s%> <S%H5922>unto<s%> him, <S%H1459>wherein<s%> was <S%H3790>written<s%> <S%H1836>thus;<s%> Unto <S%H1868>Darius<s%> the <S%H4430>king,<s%> <S%H3606>all<s%> <S%H8001>peace.<s%>

Be <S%H1934><s%> it <S%H3046>known<s%> unto the <S%H4430>king,<s%> <S%H1768>that<s%> we <S%H236>went<s%> into the <S%H4083>province<s%> of <S%H3061>Judea,<s%> to the <S%H1005>house<s%> of the <S%H7229>great<s%> <S%H426>God,<s%> <S%H1932>which<s%> is <S%H1124>built<s%> with <S%H1560>great<s%> <S%H69>stones,<s%> and <S%H636>timber<s%> is <S%H7761>laid<s%> in the <S%H3797>walls,<s%> and <S%H1791>this<s%> <S%H5673>work<s%> <S%H5648>goeth<s%> fast <S%H629>on,<s%> and <S%H6744>prospereth<s%> in their <S%H3028>hands.<s%>

Then <S%H116><s%> <S%H7593>asked<s%> we <S%H479>those<s%> <S%H7868>elders,<s%> and <S%H560>said<s%> unto them <S%H3660>thus,<s%> <S%H4479>Who<s%> <S%H7761>commanded<s%> <S%H2942><s%> you to <S%H1124>build<s%> <S%H1836>this<s%> <S%H1005>house,<s%> and to make <S%H3635>up<s%> <S%H1836>these<s%> <S%H846>walls?<s%>

We <S%H7593>asked<s%> their <S%H8036>names<s%> <S%H638>also,<s%> to <S%H3046>certify<s%> thee, <S%H1768>that<s%> we might <S%H3790>write<s%> the <S%H8036>names<s%> of the <S%H1400>men<s%> <S%H1768>that<s%> were the <S%H7217>chief<s%> of them.

And <S%H3660>thus<s%> they <S%H8421>returned<s%> us <S%H6600>answer,<s%> <S%H560>saying,<s%> <S%H586>We<s%> are the <S%H5649>servants<s%> <S%H1768>of<s%> the <S%H426>God<s%> of <S%H8065>heaven<s%> and <S%H772>earth,<s%> and <S%H1124>build<s%> the <S%H1005>house<s%> <S%H1768>that<s%> <S%H1934>was<s%> <S%H1124>built<s%> <S%H1836>these<s%> <S%H7690>many<s%> <S%H8140>years<s%> <S%H4481>ago,<s%> <S%H6928><s%> which a <S%H7229>great<s%> <S%H4430>king<s%> of <S%H3479>Israel<s%> <S%H1124>built<s%> and set <S%H3635>up.<s%>

But <S%H3861><s%> <S%H4481>after<s%> <S%H1768>that<s%> our <S%H2>fathers<s%> had provoked the God of heaven unto <S%H7265>wrath,<s%> <S%H426><s%> <S%H8065><s%> he <S%H3052>gave<s%> <S%H1994>them<s%> into the <S%H3028>hand<s%> of <S%H5020>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> the <S%H4430>king<s%> of <S%H895>Babylon,<s%> the <S%H3679>Chaldean,<s%> who <S%H5642>destroyed<s%> <S%H1836>this<s%> <S%H1005>house,<s%> and carried the people <S%H1541>away<s%> <S%H5972><s%> into <S%H895>Babylon.<s%>

But <S%H1297><s%> in the <S%H2298>first<s%> <S%H8140>year<s%> of <S%H3567>Cyrus<s%> the <S%H4430>king<s%> <S%H1768>of<s%> <S%H895>Babylon<s%> the same <S%H4430>king<s%> <S%H3567>Cyrus<s%> <S%H7761>made<s%> a <S%H2942>decree<s%> to <S%H1124>build<s%> <S%H1836>this<s%> <S%H1005>house<s%> of <S%H426>God.<s%>

And the <S%H3984>vessels<s%> <S%H638>also<s%> <S%H1768>of<s%> <S%H1722>gold<s%> and <S%H3702>silver<s%> <S%H1768>of<s%> the <S%H1005>house<s%> of <S%H426>God,<s%> <S%H1768>which<s%> <S%H5020>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H5312>took<s%> out <S%H4481>of<s%> the <S%H1965>temple<s%> <S%H1768>that<s%> was in <S%H3390>Jerusalem,<s%> and <S%H2987>brought<s%> <S%H1994>them<s%> into the <S%H1965>temple<s%> <S%H1768>of<s%> <S%H895>Babylon,<s%> <S%H1994>those<s%> did <S%H3567>Cyrus<s%> the <S%H4430>king<s%> <S%H5312>take<s%> out <S%H4481>of<s%> the <S%H1965>temple<s%> <S%H1768>of<s%> <S%H895>Babylon,<s%> and they were <S%H3052>delivered<s%> unto one, whose <S%H8036>name<s%> was <S%H8340>Sheshbazzar,<s%> <S%H1768>whom<s%> he had <S%H7761>made<s%> <S%H6347>governor;<s%>

And <S%H560>said<s%> unto him, <S%H5376>Take<s%> <S%H459>these<s%> <S%H3984>vessels,<s%> <S%H236>go,<s%> <S%H5182>carry<s%> <S%H1994>them<s%> into the <S%H1965>temple<s%> <S%H1768>that<s%> is in <S%H3390>Jerusalem,<s%> and let the <S%H1005>house<s%> of <S%H426>God<s%> be <S%H1124>built<s%> <S%H5922>in<s%> his <S%H870>place.<s%>

Then <S%H116><s%> <S%H858>came<s%> the <S%H1791>same<s%> <S%H8340>Sheshbazzar,<s%> and <S%H3052>laid<s%> the <S%H787>foundation<s%> <S%H1768>of<s%> the <S%H1005>house<s%> of <S%H426>God<s%> <S%H1768>which<s%> is in <S%H3390>Jerusalem:<s%> and <S%H4481>since<s%> that <S%H116>time<s%> even <S%H5705>until<s%> <S%H3705>now<s%> hath it been in <S%H1124>building,<s%> and yet it is <S%H3809>not<s%> <S%H8000>finished.<s%>

Now <S%H3705><s%> therefore, <S%H2006>if<s%> it seem <S%H2869>good<s%> <S%H5922>to<s%> the <S%H4430>king,<s%> let there be search <S%H1240>made<s%> in the <S%H4430>king's<s%> <S%H1596>treasure<s%> <S%H1005>house,<s%> <S%H1768>which<s%> is <S%H8536>there<s%> at <S%H895>Babylon,<s%> <S%H2006>whether<s%> it <S%H383>be<s%> so, <S%H1768>that<s%> a <S%H2942>decree<s%> was <S%H7761>made<s%> <S%H4481>of<s%> <S%H3567>Cyrus<s%> the <S%H4430>king<s%> to <S%H1124>build<s%> <S%H1791>this<s%> <S%H1005>house<s%> of <S%H426>God<s%> at <S%H3390>Jerusalem,<s%> and let the <S%H4430>king<s%> <S%H7972>send<s%> his <S%H7470>pleasure<s%> <S%H5922>to<s%> us <S%H5922>concerning<s%> this <S%H1836>matter.<s%>
